COLOR MONITORS
AND
MONITOR/RECEIVERS
Amtron color monitors and monitor/
receivers are all solid-state, employ¬
ing the unique Trinitron* single-gun
picture tube for superior color display.
Priced for the budget-concious user.
Options include pulse-cross, under¬
scan, separate RGB gun switches, ex¬
ternal sync and demod output. Write
for catalog.
